description: I will demonstrate an attack on Perl's old hash function, and show why hashes are randomized as they are in 5.18 and later. And I will talk about whether we will change the hash function we use in the future, and how much we should care about all of this anyway.
short_description: I will demonstrate an attack on Perl's old hash function, and show why hashes are randomized as they are in 5.18 and later. And
title: LPW2014 Yves Orton ‎demerphq‎   ‎Cracking Perl's Old Hash Function‎ mp4 ff
